verses.verse: בְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> and twentieth וְחָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> In the five שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year לְ֠גָלוּתֵנוּ <WH1546> of our captivity בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> in the beginning הַשָּׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> of the year בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> in the tenth לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month בְּאַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year אַחַ֕ר <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הֻכְּתָ֖ה <WH5221> was smitten הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> that the city בְּעֶ֣צֶם ׀ <WH6106> in the selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> he הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become עָלַי֙ <WH5921> and יַד־ <WH3027> the hand יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> was upon me and brought אֹתִ֖י <WH853> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <WH4759> In the visions אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God הֱבִיאַ֖נִי <WH935> brought אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> he me into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיְנִיחֵ֗נִי <WH5117> and set אֶל־ <WH413> about הַ֤ר <WH2022> mountain גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <WH1364> high מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me upon a very וְעָלָ֥יו <WH5921> and כְּמִבְנֵה־ <WH4011> by which [was] as the frame עִ֖יר <WH5892> of a city מִנֶּֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> on the south

וַיָּבֵ֨יא <WH935> And he brought אוֹתִ֜י <WH853> שָׁ֗מָּה <WH8033> there וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold אִישׁ֙ <WH376> me thither and behold [there was] a man מַרְאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4758> whose appearance כְּמַרְאֵ֣ה <WH4758> [was] like the appearance נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וּפְתִיל־ <WH6616> with a line פִּשְׁתִּ֥ים <WH6593> of flax בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וּקְנֵ֣ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּ֑ה <WH4060> and a measuring וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and he עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> and he stood בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> in the gate

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> said אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> And the man בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֡ם <WH120> of man רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> behold בְעֵינֶיךָ֩ <WH5869> with thine eyes וּבְאָזְנֶ֨יךָ <WH241> with thine ears שְּׁמָ֜ע <WH8085> and hear וְשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> and set לִבְּךָ֗ <WH3820> thine heart לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> upon all that I shall shew אוֹתָ֔ךְ <WH853> כִּ֛י <WH3588> in לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> thee for to the intent הַרְאוֹתְכָ֖ה <WH7200> that I might shew הֻבָ֣אתָה <WH935> [them] unto thee [art] thou brought הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here הַגֵּ֛ד <WH5046> hither declare אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you רֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> all that thou seest לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold חוֹמָ֛ה <WH2346> And behold a wall מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> on the outside לַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> around וּבְיַ֨ד <WH3027> hand הָאִ֜ישׁ <WH376> and in the man's קְנֵ֣ה <WH7070> reed הַמִּדָּ֗ה <WH4060> a measuring שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> of six אַמּ֤וֹת <WH520> cubits בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <WH520> [long] by the cubit וָטֹ֔פַח <WH2948> and an hand breadth וַיָּ֜מָד <WH4058> so he measured אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֤חַב <WH7341> the breadth הַבִּנְיָן֙ <WH1146> of the building קָנֶ֣ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> one וְקוֹמָ֖ה <WH6967> and the height קָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

וַיָּב֗וֹא <WH935> Then came אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> he unto the gate אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> which looketh דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִ֔ימָה <WH6921> the east וַיַּ֖עַל <WH5927> and went up [בְּמַעֲלֹותֹו כ] (בְּמַֽעֲלֹותָ֑יו <WH4609> step ק) וַיָּ֣מָד ׀ <WH4058> thereof and measured אֶת־ <WH853> סַ֣ף <WH5592> the threshold הַשַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> of the gate קָנֶ֤ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [which was] one רֹ֔חַב <WH7341> broad וְאֵת֙ <WH853> סַ֣ף <WH5592> threshold אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and the other קָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> [of the gate which was] one רֹֽחַב׃ <WH7341> broad

וְהַתָּ֗א <WH8372> And [every] little chamber קָנֶ֨ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> [was] one אֹ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH753> long וְקָנֶ֤ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָד֙ <WH259> and one רֹ֔חַב <WH7341> broad וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַתָּאִ֖ים <WH8372> and between the little chambers חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> [were] five אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits וְסַ֣ף <WH5592> and the threshold הַ֠שַּׁעַר <WH8179> of the gate מֵאֵ֨צֶל <WH681> by אוּלָ֥ם <WH197> the porch הַשַּׁ֛עַר <WH8179> of the gate מֵֽהַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> within קָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [was] one
וַיָּ֜מָד <WH4058> He measured אֶת־ <WH853> אֻלָ֥ם <WH197> also the porch הַשַּׁ֛עַר <WH8179> of the gate מֵהַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> within קָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> reed אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> one

וַיָּ֜מָד <WH4058> Then measured אֶת־ <WH853> אֻלָ֤ם <WH197> he the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> of the gate שְׁמֹנֶ֣ה <WH8083> eight אַמּ֔וֹת <WH520> cubits [וְאֵילֹו כ] (וְאֵילָ֖יו <WH352> mighty ק) שְׁתַּ֣יִם <WH8147> thereof two אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits וְאֻלָ֥ם <WH197> and the porch הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> of the gate מֵהַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> [was] inward

וְתָאֵ֨י <WH8372> And the little chambers הַשַּׁ֜עַר <WH8179> of the gate דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִ֗ים <WH6921> the east שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> [were] three מִפֹּה֙ <WH6311> on this side וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> and three מִפֹּ֔ה <WH6311> on that side מִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֖ת <WH259> [were] of one לִשְׁלָשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH7969> they three וּמִדָּ֥ה <WH4060> measure אַחַ֛ת <WH259> had one לָאֵילִ֖ם <WH352> and the posts מִפֹּ֥ה <WH6311> each וּמִפּֽוֹ׃ <WH6311> side

וַיָּ֛מָד <WH4058> And he measured אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֥חַב <WH7341> the breadth פֶּֽתַח־ <WH6607> of the entry הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> of the gate עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> [and] the length הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate שְׁל֥וֹשׁ <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> ten אַמּֽוֹת׃ <WH520> cubits

וּגְב֞וּל <WH1366> The space לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> also before הַתָּאוֹת֙ <WH8372> the little chambers אַמָּ֣ה <WH520> cubit אֶחָ֔ת <WH259> [was] one וְאַמָּה־ <WH520> [was] one cubit אַחַ֥ת <WH259> one גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> [on this side] and the space מִפֹּ֑ה <WH6311> each וְהַתָּ֕א <WH8372> on that side and the little chambers שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> [were] six אַמּ֣וֹת <WH520> cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> side וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> on this side and six אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits מִפּֽוֹ׃ <WH6311> each

וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> He measured אֶת־ <WH853> הַשַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> then the gate מִגַּ֤ג <WH1406> from the roof הַתָּא֙ <WH8372> of [one] little chamber לְגַגּ֔וֹ <WH1406> to the roof רֹ֕חַב <WH7341> of another the breadth עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty וְחָמֵ֖שׁ <WH2568> [was] five אַמּ֑וֹת <WH520> cubits פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> door נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> opposite פָּֽתַח׃ <WH6607> against door

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> He made אֶת־ <WH853> אֵילִ֖ים <WH352> also posts שִׁשִּׁ֣ים <WH8346> of threescore אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אֵיל֙ <WH352> even unto the post הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <WH2691> of the court הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> the gate סָבִ֥יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> about

וְעַ֗ל <WH5921> and פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> And from the face הַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate [הַיֹּאתֹון כ] (הָֽאִיתֹ֔ון <WH2978> entrance ק) עַל־ <WH5921> unto לִפְנֵ֕י <WH6440> unto the face אֻלָ֥ם <WH197> of the porch הַשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> gate הַפְּנִימִ֑י <WH6442> of the inner חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> [were] fifty אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וְחַלֹּנ֣וֹת <WH2474> windows אֲטֻמ֣וֹת <WH331> And [there were] narrow אֶֽל־ <WH413> toward הַתָּאִ֡ים <WH8372> to the little chambers וְאֶל֩ <WH413> and toward אֵלֵיהֵ֨מָה <WH352> and to their posts לִפְנִ֤ימָה <WH6441> within לַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> the gate סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> [were] round about וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> and likewise לָאֵֽלַמּ֑וֹת <WH361> and likewise to the arches וְחַלּוֹנ֞וֹת <WH2474> and windows סָבִ֤יב ׀ <WH5439> all סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> around לִפְנִ֔ימָה <WH6441> inward וְאֶל־ <WH413> and toward אַ֖יִל <WH352> and upon [each] post תִּמֹרִֽים׃ <WH8561> [were] palm trees

וַיְבִיאֵ֗נִי <WH935> Then brought אֶל־ <WH413> faced הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <WH2691> court הַחִ֣יצוֹנָ֔ה <WH2435> he me into the outward וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold לְשָׁכוֹת֙ <WH3957> and lo [there were] chambers וְרִֽצְפָ֔ה <WH7531> and a pavement עָשׂ֥וּי <WH6213> made לֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> for the court סָבִ֣יב ׀ <WH5439> round about סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> around שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty לְשָׁכ֖וֹת <WH3957> chambers אֶל־ <WH413> faced הָרִֽצְפָֽה׃ <WH7531> [were] upon the pavement

וְהָרִֽצְפָה֙ <WH7531> And the pavement אֶל־ <WH413> by כֶּ֣תֶף <WH3802> by the side הַשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <WH8179> of the gates לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> over against אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> the length הַשְּׁעָרִ֑ים <WH8179> of the gates הָרִֽצְפָ֖ה <WH7531> pavement הַתַּחְתּוֹנָֽה׃ <WH8481> [was] the lower

וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> Then he measured רֹ֡חַב <WH7341> the breadth מִלִּפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> from the forefront הַשַּׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate הַתַּחְתּ֜וֹנָה <WH8481> of the lower לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> unto the forefront הֶחָצֵ֧ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֛י <WH6442> of the inner מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> an hundred אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits הַקָּדִ֖ים <WH6921> eastward וְהַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> and northward

וְהַשַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> And the gate אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which פָּנָיו֙ <WH6440> that looked דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> the north לֶחָצֵ֖ר <WH2691> court הַחִֽיצוֹנָ֑ה <WH2435> of the outward מָדַ֥ד <WH4058> he measured אָרְכּ֖וֹ <WH753> the length וְרָחְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7341> thereof and the breadth

[וְתָאֹו כ] (וְתָאָ֗יו <WH8372> chamber ק) שְׁלוֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> thereof [were] three מִפּוֹ֙ <WH6311> each וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> on this side and three מִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> side [וְאֵילֹו כ] (וְאֵילָ֤יו <WH352> mighty ק) [וְאֵלַמֹּו כ] (וְאֵֽלַמָּיו֙ <WH361> arch ק) הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> had כְּמִדַּ֖ת <WH4060> thereof were after the measure הַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> of the first חֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <WH2572> thereof [was] fifty אַמָּה֙ <WH520> cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <WH753> the length וְרֹ֕חַב <WH7341> and the breadth חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty בָּאַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

[וְחַלֹּונֹו כ] (וְחַלֹּונָ֤יו <WH2474> window ק) [וְאֵלַמֹּו כ] (וְאֵֽלַמָּיו֙ <WH361> arch ק) [וְתִמֹרֹו כ] (וְתִ֣מֹרָ֔יו <WH8561> palm tree ק) כְּמִדַּ֣ת <WH4060> [were] after the measure הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> that looketh דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַקָּדִ֑ים <WH6921> the east וּבְמַעֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> steps שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH7651> unto it by seven יַֽעֲלוּ־ <WH5927> and they went up ב֔וֹ [וְאֵילַמֹּו כ] (וְאֵֽילַמָּ֖יו <WH361> arch ק) לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> thereof [were] before

וְשַׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> And the gate לֶחָצֵ֣ר <WH2691> court הַפְּנִימִ֔י <WH6442> of the inner נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> opposite הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> [was] over against the gate לַצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> toward the north וְלַקָּדִ֑ים <WH6921> and toward the east וַיָּ֧מָד <WH4058> and he measured מִשַּׁ֛עַר <WH8179> from gate אֶל־ <WH413> to שַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> to gate מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> an hundred אַמָּֽה׃ <WH520> cubits

וַיּוֹלִכֵ֙נִי֙ <WH1980> led דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> me toward הַדָּר֔וֹם <WH1864> the south וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold שַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> and behold a gate דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> toward הַדָּר֑וֹם <WH1864> the south וּמָדַ֤ד <WH4058> and he measured [אֵילֹו כ] (אֵילָיו֙ <WH352> mighty ק) [וְאֵילַמֹּו כ] (וְאֵ֣ילַמָּ֔יו <WH361> arch ק) כַּמִּדּ֖וֹת <WH4060> thereof according to these measures הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> to those

וַיָּ֨מָד <WH4058> So he measured אֶת־ <WH853> הֶחָצֵ֜ר <WH2691> the court אֹ֣רֶךְ ׀ <WH753> long מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> an hundred אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֛חַב <WH7341> broad מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> and an hundred אַמָּ֖ה <WH520> cubits מְרֻבָּ֑עַת <WH7251> foursquare וְהַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> and the altar לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> [that was] before הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וַיְבִאֵנִי֮ <WH935> And he brought אֶל־ <WH413> to אֻלָ֣ם <WH197> me to the porch הַבַּיִת֒ <WH1004> of the house וַיָּ֙מָד֙ <WH4058> and measured אֵ֣ל <WH352> [each] post אֻלָ֔ם <WH197> of the porch חָמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> five אַמּוֹת֙ <WH520> cubits מִפֹּ֔ה <WH6311> each וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> on this side and five אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits מִפֹּ֑ה <WH6311> side וְרֹ֣חַב <WH7341> on that side and the breadth הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <WH7969> [was] three אַמּוֹת֙ <WH520> cubits מִפּ֔וֹ <WH6311> each וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> on this side and three אַמּ֖וֹת <WH520> cubits מִפּֽוֹ׃ <WH6311> side

אֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> The length הָאֻלָ֞ם <WH197> of the porch עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> [was] twenty אַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits וְרֹ֙חַב֙ <WH7341> and the breadth עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten אַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וּבַֽמַּעֲל֔וֹת <WH4609> and [he brought me] by the steps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יַעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> whereby they went up אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וְעַמֻּדִים֙ <WH5982> to it and [there were] pillars אֶל־ <WH413> about הָ֣אֵילִ֔ים <WH352> by the posts אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> one מִפֹּ֖ה <WH6311> each וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> on this side and another מִפֹּֽה׃ <WH6311> side
